public abstract class NCLBase<T extends NCLElement,Ei extends NCLImportBase>
extends NCLIdentifiableElementPrototype<T>

setDoc

public void setDoc(T doc)
Overrides:
setDoc in class NCLElementPrototype<T extends NCLElement>

addImportBase

public boolean addImportBase(Ei importBase)
                      throws XMLException
Adds an element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document to the base of rules. The base can have none or several import elements.

Parameters:
importBase - element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document.
Returns:
true if the import element was added.
Throws:
XMLException - if the import element is null.

removeImportBase

public boolean removeImportBase(Ei importBase)
                         throws XMLException
Removes an element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document of the base of rules. The base can have none or several import elements.

Parameters:
importBase - element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document.
Returns:
true if the import element was removed.
Throws:
XMLException - if the import element is null.

hasImportBase

public boolean hasImportBase(Ei importBase)
                      throws XMLException
Verifies if the base of rules has a specific element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document. The base can have none or several import elements.

Parameters:
importBase - element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document.
Returns:
true if the base of rules has the import element.
Throws:
XMLException - if the import element is null.

hasImportBase

public boolean hasImportBase()
Verifies if the base of rules has at least one element that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document. The base can have none or several import elements.

Returns:
true if the base of rules has at least import element.

getImportBases

public ElementList<Ei> getImportBases()
Returns the list of elements that imports a base of rules defined in another NCL document. The base can have none or several import elements.

Returns:
element list with all import elements.

createImportBase

protected Ei createImportBase()
                                             throws XMLException
Function to create the child element importBase. This function must be overwritten in classes that extends this one.

Returns:
element representing the child importBase.
Throws:
XMLException
